snippet.title: Sonic Skyfall WIP Showcase #1: New Abilities & Super Binds
snippet.description:
This is a video where I go through some of the things that I plan on adding to Sonic Skyfall in a future update. This video represents a work in progress where everything shown is subject to change.

Also, here’s a couple of things I don’t explain in my showcase. Sonic Wind, Chaos Rift, & Chaos Blast all use a similar function being Radial Damge. Each have different ranges, hence how you’ll have to determine when and where to use them. Sonic Wind - 2000 Units. Chaos Rift - 5000 Units. Chaos Blast - 10000 Units. It is possible that these values may change down the line.

Updates will happen only when they are ready.

GameJolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/sonicskyfall/825066
